mapper.select: SELECT m.fid,m.fequipment_no,m.ftype_id,m.fposition,m.fstatus_id,i.fid iid,i.fname iname,d.fvaluename mname,d.fvalue mid,ins.fid fmoney,ins.fname fmodifier FROM tb_welding_machine m LEFT JOIN tb_dictionary d ON m.fmanufacturer_id=d.fvalue AND d.ftypeid=14 LEFT JOIN tb_insframework i ON m.finsframework_id=i.fid LEFT JOIN tb_insframework ins ON ins.fid=i.fparent AND ins.ftype=22 WHERE 1=1 order by m.fequipment_no asc

SELECT w.fid fid,fstatus_id, i.fid iid,g.fid gid,ftype_id,m.fid mid, fequipment_no,fgather_no ,fjoin_time,i.fname iname,fmoney ,m.fname mname,fisnetworking,fposition,d.fvaluename statusname,di.fvaluename typename FROM tb_welding_machine w INNER JOIN tb_insframework i ON w.finsframework_id = i.fid INNER JOIN tb_equipment_manufacturer m ON w.fmanufacturer_id = m.fid INNER JOIN tb_dictionary d ON d.fvalue = w.fstatus_id INNER JOIN tb_dictionary di ON di.fvalue = w.ftype_id left JOIN tb_gather g ON g.fid = w.fgather_id where (d.ftypeid=3 and di.ftypeid=4) and w.fid = #{wid}
SELECT fid FROM tb_welding_machine where fequipment_no = #{eno}
SELECT fid FROM tb_welding_machine where finsframework_id = #{insfId}
SELECT count(*) FROM tb_welding_machine WHERE fequipment_no = #{eno}
SELECT count(*) FROM tb_welding_machine m inner join tb_gather g on m.fgather_id = g.fid where m.finsframework_id=#{itemid} and g.fgather_no=#{gather}

SELECT count(m.fid) FROM tb_welding_machine m inner join tb_insframework i on i.fid = m.finsframework_id inner join tb_insframework ins on ins.fid = i.fparent inner join tb_insframework insf on insf.fid = ins.fparent WHERE fmanufacturer_id = #{mid} and (ins.fparent = #{id} or ins.fid = #{id} or i.fid = #{id} or insf.fparent=#{id})
SELECT fid FROM tb_welding_machine WHERE fgather_id = #{gatherid}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_welding_machine(ftype_id, fequipment_no, fstatus_id, fposition, finsframework_id, fmanufacturer_id,fgather_id,fmoney, fisnetworking, fjoin_time,fcreator,fcreatetime) VALUES (#{typeId},#{equipmentNo},#{statusId},#{position},#{insframeworkId.id},#{manufacturerId.id},#{gatherId.id},#{money},#{isnetworking},#{joinTime},#{creator},now())
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_welding_machine SET fgather_id=null where fid = #{wid}
UPDATE tb_welding_machine SET fstatus_id=#{status} where fid = #{wid}
